article_title: UN Security Council backs US Gaza ceasefire resolution
sentence: The  proposal  sets  out  conditions  for  a  "full  and  complete  ceasefire",  the  release  of  hostages  held  by  Hamas,  the  return  of  dead  hostages'  remains  and  the  exchange  of  Palestinian  prisoners.

article_title: UN Security Council backs US Gaza ceasefire resolution
sentence: The  conflict  began  when  Hamas  attacked  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  some  251  people  hostage.
